description: A very nice Zebra this adorable, plush, jungle animal toy set is the best way to introduce your precious little ones to the wonderful animals of the jungle! Complete with a plush carrier in the shape of a tree and four amazing, squeaky, stuffed animals, this play set is sure to keep your little baby entertained in between meal and nap times. Plus it’s a great way to start teaching your little angel about the colors and sounds of these magnificent, wild animals.

Pull along toy Elephant, a joyfully looking wooden animal on wheels with a string, will accompany your child in a lovely walk in a park or even at home. Cute and not easy to break, it is also a reliable friend in different kind of plays. Just take a look how lovely the toy looks when it is obediently rolling behind its little master! Wooden Toy Elephant is made from ash tree, and it is covered with colour made from renewable and fully bio-degradable natural binder raw materials. Uncoloured parts of the wood are treated with linseed oil. For strings we use coloured or uncoloured linen cords. Our Elephant's ears are made from non-toxic leather. Pull along toys are meant for children from 3 years of age. !!! For additional cost of 4 Euro we offer to personalise this toy for you!

Wooden toy plans are creative playthings which entertain and educate your kids simultaneously. Are you in search of some amazing and educative toy plans? If so, then this article will brief you on some of the toy plans to choose from!
